name: 8 days, of Mandatory Fun (Weird Al's latest album)

questions.question: "Got my new resume it's printed in" this Tacky font choice
In his Royals parady, Al dons this on his head to protect himself from thought control radiation.
questions.answer: What is aluminum foil? (or a tin foil/aluminum hat)

questions.question: Not a true Word Crime, its okay "If you really wanna" do this to "that Oxford comma"
OECD / wealthy people issues: "I bought too many groceries for my refrigerator; Forgot my gardener's name, I'll have to ask him later"
Escape from the category, finish this Handy rhyme: "Still rocking my screwdriver; Got the whole world thinking I'm..."
